title: Avenue Nine Residencies
details:
Brand New and Ready to Move In!

Air Conditioned 03 Bedrooms and 02 Bathroom Unit (including spacious en suite master bedroom) plus Maid's Quarters on the Third Floor

Located just 100 Meters from the Mount Lavinia Hotel, Walking Distance to S. Thomas' College, Golden Mile Beach, Mount Lavinia Train Station and Mount Lavinia Town Center

Spacious Living and Dining with Designer Pantry, Plenty of Natural Light and Ventilation

Modern Elegant Fittings, Fixtures and Finishers

24 Hour Security & CCTV System
Solar Electricity & Back-Up Power via Standby Generator
Dedicated Parking Plus Visitors Parking
Rooftop for Private Events with Stunning View Overlooking Mount Lavinia Hotel, Indian Ocean and Colombo City Skyline and Much More

CoC Obtained, Freehold Title and Deed, Loan Facility can be arranged.

Viewing Arranged Upon Prior Appointment
